title: Sabotaged Reconciliation
outcome: Directorate loyalists sabotage the widely celebrated Reconciliation Spiral protocol, causing system malfunctions in free zones and sparking paranoia. Emergency alliances form, restoring transparency but exposing historic BCI abuses, deepening public outrage and breaking the Council’s fragile authority.

events.description: Major free zones report sudden data losses and mysterious system glitches. Residents blame the Directorate for targeting the reconciliation protocol, fueling suspicion and unrest.

Zone technologists and Oksana Lintz coordinate emergency code audits. Evidence of deliberate external interference is uncovered, pointing to Directorate agents. Free zones demand restoration of pre-BCI control.

Emergency forums unite zones and key engineers. With support from free zone councils, they reopen old data channels that Halden locked, briefly restoring stability but revealing historic BCI abuses previously covered up.
Exposed evidence of past BCI abuses, disappearances, and systemic targeting spreads through the city. The public blames the Council, leading to citywide protests and internal resignations.
